message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of the money decreases faster for you than it does for me. This offer is fair considering the time pressure we're both under.
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable.  My offer is still generous considering the rapid inflation hitting my share.  This is the last round I'll offer more than half.
